title: Handle an Artist Cancellation
description: A major artist has canceled their upcoming concert due to illness. The event manager must handle the fallout.

tasks.description: Receive the official cancellation notice from the artist's promoter.
Work with the promoter to find a potential rescheduled date.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent checks the venue calendar and proposes several open dates to the promoter.

tasks.description: Coordinate with the ticketing department to communicate the cancellation/reschedule options to all ticket holders.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent provides the ticketing team with the official message to send to customers.

tasks.description: Cancel all associated internal work orders and vendor services for the original date.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent cancels all work orders for staffing, catering, and security.
